title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
this macbook does not charge, only green light appears.I already did a test with another good battery and magsafe board same problem
.One piece of information: the macbook only turns on with the charger and battery, when I place only the charger, the fan restarts after a while and no video.Also battery customer its no original apple

some measurements with charger only
PPBUS_G3H=12.64
PP3V42_G3H =3.46
measurements with charger and good battery
PPBUS_G3H=12.0
PP3V42_G3H =3.46

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
Post exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.
Check if works in SMC bypass mode, with charger only.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
between pins  17 and 18 charger =132 ohms
between pin 27 and 28 charger=20.2 ohms

macbook with charger only turn on and video in bypass mode

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
"pins  17 and 18 charger =132 ohms"
Check R7051/52 and their traces.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
r7052= 130 ohm but it had a glue from the component on the side Q9425 I removed it and the value was new r7052=3.2ohms
r7051=2.4ohms
traces is good

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message: Post again resistance between pins 17/18; should be 5 ohm approx.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
measures taken again
pin 17/18=6.7 ohms
r7052=3.9ohms
r7051=2.5ohms

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
Is the battery recognized by macOS and correctly shows is percentage?

Test the board disconnecting BIL (J6955).
Post voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
Is the battery recognized by macOS and correctly shows is percentage? yes
SCL/SDA=0.521/0.519
but it is detecting me ast bad battery and batery is good, and  fan is spinning me too much

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
"macbook with charger only turn on and video in bypass mode"
Run HWMonitor and look for strange I/V and temp values.

Fan spining high points to some temperature sensor issue.
Did you test with known good trackpad flex/board?
Also test disconnecting webcam.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
hello already well regulated fans; no problems.
My question is if the non-original apple battery can be the cause of problems in charger U7000 or resistors?
como se si una bateria  no original de apple cumple con las especificaciones  tecnicas de voltage, corriente, capacidad y no tenga problemas en el equipo?
algun valor me pueda indicar de referencia ?
puedo seguir usando bateria no original de apple sin problemas?

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message:
The board should turn on and boot without battery.
If only turn on in SMC bypass mode (without battery) there is a problem with a SMC sensor.
Check all sensors from pages 49-50.
Should be good to run corresponding EFI ASD test.

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message: ok thanks, the macbook already turns me on without battery after solving the resistance problem, I already did the efi test and it passes. what I wanted to ask  you was if a non original-apple battery can cause problems on board, its possible? thanks

title: 820-2936 only green light, no charging
message: Machine can work with non-original battery without problems.
